title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.31 - Aircraft and fuel dispensing apparatus to be grounded by wire
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.31 - Aircraft and fuel dispensing apparatus to be grounded by wire

State Regulations

During all fuel handling operations in connection
with any aircraft at an air terminal, the aircraft and the fuel dispensing or
draining apparatus shall be grounded by wire to prevent the possibility of
static ignition of volatile liquids. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
